__e: You soon decided to leave together, so you bought two plane tickets to France.
Ted and me have had enough of aeroplanes to do us a lifetime.
We had a 12-hour plane trip to see you.
Should be enough for the airplane tickets, ...and everything else, right?
I bought him a plane ticket and, the day he was 16, he quit school.
Is it true that he was in a plane crash and had to eat his own wife?
